title: PEOPLECERT & DATAFLOW Join Forces to Provide Integrated Assessment…
content:
The combined strengths of both companies will provide world-class primary source verification and examinations services to form a complete licensure programme and close the loop in the candidate exam… 
 
(PRWeb September 23, 2015) 
 
Read the full story at http://www.prweb.com/releases/2015/09/prweb12976032.htm
